name: gastro-acid
effect: The target’s ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field. This effect is passed on by baton pass.
short_effect: Nullifies target’s ability until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.x-y: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
